Plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.
Title: Sleepy Hollow
Writer: Washington Irving (story "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow"), Kevin Yagher (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson, Michael Gambon
tomatoConsensus: Sleepy Hollow entertains with its stunning visuals and creepy atmosphere.
